"use client" import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import Navbar from "../Layout/Navbar" import Footer from "../Layout/Footer" const CourseMaterials = () => { const { courseId } = useParams() // Get courseId from URL return ( <>

Course Materials

Materials for Course ID: {courseId}

 Course Materials (Coming Soon)

This section will display course materials such as lecture notes, assignments, and resources for the selected course.

) } export default CourseMaterials
